Management about hotel

Freshly renovated and ideally situated on Broadbeach Island, this slice of paradise is the perfect place to combine relaxation and free-spirited fun. 596 luxurious rooms, enjoy sweeping coastal and hinterland views and kick back poolside. With award winning restaurants, a 24 hour casino and our Event Centre all within arm's reach, you have all the ingredients for a memorable stay!

From:A$ 169.00
Book this hotel

Latest reviews on this hotel

Honest reviews from our guests
Jenny
May 2024
5.0

Great smorgasbord meals, good value, plenty of fresh seafood and meats, very clean, we have been there a few times and will definitely go back, the casino is fun, parking is easy, you have to book ahead for the smorgasbord they have different options on different days, the weekend has a better seafood selection.
